author: anon.
contents: marginal scholia (?) mentioning Argos, Troy and Helen.
statepreservation: at least 6 incomplete and much damaged lines, underneath a line of unidentified signs ("wavy horizontal line", cf. description of plate).
lectionalsigns: long horizontal throughout l. 6 (to separate sections?).
hand: medium to fair-sized, informal, angular, leaning forward, markedly bilinear, though rather irregular in size, written by a competent hand, separating all letters, without decorations.
